body: Dear Ana A. and STULZ Hiring Team,

I am excited to apply for the Director of Customer Support and Field Services position at STULZ USA. With over 15 years of experience leading multi-functional service organizations in high-reliability industries, I bring a proven ability to deliver world-class post-shipment support across Field Service, Technical Support, Service Coordination, Parts, and Training.

In my current role as Sr. Operations, Data Analytics & Customer Support Leader, I have directed service strategy, standardized SOPs and escalation protocols, and implemented KPI-driven dashboards that improved CSAT by 20% and cut response times by 30%. I also expanded aftermarket revenue through spare parts and retrofit offerings while building a leadership pipeline to support future scale. These outcomes reflect a balance of operational rigor and customer-first focus that aligns directly with STULZ’s mission of responsiveness and reliability.

As a former Army Aviation Officer and Standardization Pilot, I managed training and readiness for 400+ aviators, enforced operational standards across units, and implemented one of the Army’s earliest LMS/KMS systems. This experience honed my ability to lead under mission-critical conditions, build scalable systems, and ensure compliance and safety—all directly transferable to leading national field service and technical support operations at STULZ.
I look forward to the opportunity to bring my background in service operations, customer support, and cross-functional leadership to STULZ USA. Thank you for your time and consideration.
